name: 蕭勝輝
objective: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
schedule:
週次/單元主題
1/課程介紹
2~3/Chapter 1. Structure and Bonding
4~5/Chapter 2. Polar Covalent Bonds: Acids and Bases
5/第一次測驗
5~6/Chapter 3. Organic Compounds: Alkanes and Their Stereochemistry
7~8/Chapter 4. Organic Compounds: Cycloalkanes and Their Stereochemistry
9/第二次測驗（期中考）
10~11/Chapter 5. Stereochemistry at Tetrahedral Centers
11~12/Chapter 6. An overview of Organic Reactions
13/第三次測驗
13~14/Chapter 7. Alkenes and Alkynes
14~15/Chapter 8. Reactions of Alkenes and Alkynes
16~17/Chapter 9. Aromatic Compounds
18/第四次測驗（期末考）
scorePolicy: 出缺勤、學習態度、四次測驗（含期中考及期末考）
materials:
教科書：John McMurry, Organic Chemistry with Biological Approach, Taiwan edition, Cengage Learning, Taiwan Branch, 2016.
教材投影片 pdf 檔可自網路學園下載
